node.title: Death warrant signed for thousands of brumbies as Kosciuszko plan finalised
node.alt: Three brown brumbies with a small, brown foal stand in an open plain in Kosciuszko National Park.
node.description: Conservationists are welcoming a move to try and reduce the park's feral horse population by about 75 per cent over the next six years, but say the numbers should never have been allowed to rise so high.
node.content:
["The New South Wales government has finalised its wild horse management plan that will see thousands of brumbies removed from Kosciuszko National Park.", "The horse population will be reduced from 14,380 to 3,000 by 2027\u00a0through passive trapping, rehoming and ground shooting.", "The wild horses will also be restricted to 32 per cent of the park.", "Richard Swain, a river guide and Indigenous ambassador with the Invasive Species Council, says he is glad the population will be reduced.", "\"It's good news \u2014 any removal of horses is good news,\" Mr Swain said.", "\"For me, it was never about numbers \u2014 the country has gaping wounds everywhere you have feral horses on.", "While he is\u00a0pleased that rehoming will start immediately, he\u00a0says\u00a0the\u00a0plan will \"lock in destruction\" in certain parts of the park.", "\"The whole Snowy River, where they will leave horses around the Byadbo and the Pilot wilderness, where the Murray River begins \u2014\u00a0it's a disaster in there,\" he said.", "\"Parks [staff] are in there fencing off areas as we speak.\"", "", "
Richard Swain has been fighting to have brumby numbers in Kosciuszko National Park drastically reduced for years.(ABC Riverina: Rosie King)
", "Nature Conservation Council chief executive Chris Gambian welcomed the plan but urged the government to commit resources to the project.", "\"Horses in Kosciuszko National Park have been doing untold damage to iconic landscapes for decades,\" he said.", "\"The challenge for the government and the National Parks and Wildlife Service now is to ensure the plan is implemented quickly and efficiently, with the resources needed to get the job done.\"", "", "
Nearly 500 wild horses from Kosciuszko National Park were rehomed last year.(ABC News: Jess Davis)
", "
'We will have extinctions'
", "The initial NSW draft wild horse management plan in 2016 would have seen the horse population reduced from 6,000\u00a0to 600.", "Since then the\u00a0population is estimated to\u00a0have increased to more than 14,000.", "Mr Swain pointed out that more horses would\u00a0inevitably be shot under the new plan because of the numbers, and said there was not enough demand from landholders to rehome 11,000 of the beasts.", "\"John Barilaro's legacy is that thousands more horses will die, and thousands more native animals will be left homeless and we will have extinctions,\" he said.", "", "
Mr Barilaro says he's happy with the plan, but accepts not everyone will agree with it.(News Video)
", "Mr Barilaro, the Member for Monaro and the former dupty premier, made the surprise announcement that the plan had been finalised during his valedictory speech in state parliament yesterday afternoon.", "He said he was satisfied with the plan.", "\"It brings the balance that we've always tried to achieve, and accepting that parts of the park are\u00a0capable of hosting or homing horses,\" Mr Barilaro said.", "\"But at the same time, making sure those sensitive wilderness areas, those very fragile environments, are protected.", "\"I've always said, 'Let's not fight over what the starting point' \u2014 let's fight over what the numbers should be, and that's what we've achieved.\"", "
'Middle ground'
", "Environment Minister Matt Kean says the plan will break the impasse over how the horses are managed while protecting Kosciusko National Park.", "\"We know that Kosciusko is an ecological wonderland, and these hard-hoofed animals have done untold damage because they've been out of control,\" he said.", "\"But we also know there a lot of people that love these animals and I've been trying to find a way through, a middle ground, and I think we've done it.", "Annual surveys of the wild horse population will be used to\u00a0monitor progress toward the targets in the plan.", "The state government said the removal of wild horses would be carried out in\u00a0accordance with best practice animal welfare requirements.", "", "
Alan Lanyon believes the brumbies are an important part of Australia's history and need to be protected.(ABC Riverina: Rosie King)
", "
Plan still 'contentious'
", "The implementation will\u00a0begin immediately, with the reintroduction of passive trapping and rehoming.", "While aerial culling has been ruled out, control methods will\u00a0include ground shooting, shooting in trap yards, and transporting horses\u00a0to abattoirs.", "Alan Lanyon from the Snowy Mountains Sustainability and Management Group has long disputed the official numbers of wild horses in the park.", "He says it is disappointing that culling has been included as one of the methods in controlling horse numbers.", "\"If Minister Kean had looked at the submissions and took out provisions for lethal control, ground shooting, then a lot of the heat would have been taken out of the document,\" he said.", "\"There are some parts of it we support, but until they undertake a population survey and remove ground shooting, it will always remain a contentious document.\""]
